attributes.action: Stop deliberate damage by drilling and the placing of expasion bolts in British natural; unquarried rock, cliffs and mountain crags by some British rock climbers / mountaineers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some British rock climbers, many of them members of the British Mountaineering Council, have, against the wishes of other climbers, deliberately damaged by drilling (and placing expansion bolts) natural (unquarried) cliffs and crags from Lands End to the Highlands of Scotlands in the last twenty years. This proliferation of bolts as even taken place at sites of Special Scientific Interest. It is probable, that the vast majority of some 4 million hillgoers do not want this deliberate  damage to the environment to continue.
